statements: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE ANY v IN a1 SATISFIES v IS NOT VALUED END AND test_id = "parameters"

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'Order' AND CONTAINS(v.`sort_terms`[0].`expr`, "_index_key") END

statements: SELECT c2, c3, c4 FROM orders WHERE test_id = "idxfltr" AND c1 = 1 AND (c2 = 311 OR c4 = 221) ORDER BY c6 LIMIT 2

testcase: MB-55236, part 2, different OR subterm ordering, early order

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'Order' AND CONTAINS(v.`sort_terms`[0].`expr`, "_index_key") END

statements: SELECT c2, c3, c4 FROM orders WHERE test_id = "idxfltr" AND c1 = 1 AND (c4 = 221 OR c2 = 311) ORDER BY c6 LIMIT 2

testcase: MB-55236, part 3, no limit, no early order, union scan

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'UnionScan' END

statements: SELECT c2, c3, c4 FROM orders WHERE test_id = "idxfltr" AND c1 = 1 AND (c4 = 221 OR c2 = 311) ORDER BY c6

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE EVERY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES (v.`#operator` IS MISSING OR v.`#operator` != 'IntersectScan') END

statements: SELECT * FROM shellTest WHERE c1 = 1 AND c2 = 10

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`index` = 'iorix2' AND v.`index_keys` IS NOT MISSING AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.spans) = 2 AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.spans[0].`range`) = 3 AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.spans[1].`range`) = 2 END

statements: SELECT c2, c3, c4 FROM orders WHERE test_id = "idxfltr" AND c1 = 1 AND ((15 BETWEEN c2 AND c4) OR (c2 BETWEEN 200 AND 300)) ORDER BY c6 LIMIT 2

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`index` = 'iorix1' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.spans) = 2 AND v.`index_group_aggs` IS MISSING END

statements: SELECT count(1) AS cnt FROM orders WHERE test_id = "idxfltr" AND c1 = 1 AND ((c2 = 11 AND IFMISSINGORNULL($qp1, "") != "") OR (IFMISSINGORNULL($qp1, "") == ""))

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`index` = 'iorix2' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.spans) = 2 AND v.`index_group_aggs` IS MISSING END

statements: SELECT count(c6) AS cnt FROM orders WHERE test_id = "idxfltr" AND c1 = 1 AND ((c2 = 11 AND IFMISSINGORNULL($qp1, "") != "") OR (IFMISSINGORNULL($qp1, "") == ""))
